Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toCLI.subTurnClasses

Class CLIChooseCardsPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toCLI.interfaces.CLISubTurnViewer
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toCLI.subTurnClasses.CLIChooseCardsPhase
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpecificSubTurnViewer
public class CLIChooseCardsPhase
extends CLISubTurnViewer
Class that represents the CLISubTurnViewer ChooseCard on the CLI using methods of CLIPrintFunction, ANSIStyle and CLIGodSymbols
Author:
Marco
See Also:
CLISubTurnViewer, CLIPrintFunction, ANSIStyle, CLIGodSymbols, ViewCard

  • Method Details

    • showChooseInterface

      private void showChooseInterface()
      Uses private methods to show a list with god cards to the player as long as he chooses a god card for all the player

    • printCardList

      private void printCardList()
      Prints a numbered list with Gods' Symbols and gods
      See Also:
      CLIGodSymbols

    • checkLeftSelect

      private java.lang.String checkLeftSelect​(ViewCard viewCard, boolean addSelectionSymbol)
      checks if the card is selected, then returns the selected style if it is and the selection left symbol if addSelectionSymbol == true or a string with space if it isn't. Returns a string of space without color if the card isn't selected
      Parameters:
      viewCard - ViewCard to control
      addSelectionSymbol - boolean parameter to add or not the selection symbol
      Returns:
      String with left selection color and symbol if addSelectionSymbol == true or with space if it isn't

    • checkRightSelect

      private java.lang.String checkRightSelect​(ViewCard viewCard, boolean addSelectionSymbol)
      checks if the card is selected, then returns the selected style if it is and the selection right symbol if addSelectionSymbol == true or a string with space if it isn't. Returns a string of space without color if the card isn't selected
      Parameters:
      viewCard - ViewCard to control
      addSelectionSymbol - boolean parameter to add or not the selection symbol
      Returns:
      String with right selection color and symbol if addSelectionSymbol == true or with space if it isn't

    • showGodRequest

      private int showGodRequest()
      Shows a request to see god's description and checks it
      Returns:
      number of god selected

    • showCardSelected

      private void showCardSelected​(int godCardNumber)
      Shows card's specifics and the request of selection or deselection when it is deselected or not as long as player's response is accepted
      Parameters:
      godCardNumber - number of the ViewCard chosen

    • SelOrDeselRequest

      private boolean SelOrDeselRequest​(ViewCard viewCard)
      Prints the request of selection or deselection and returns true if the response is correct, false if it isn't
      Parameters:
      viewCard - ViewCard chosen
      Returns:
      true if the card is correctly sel/desel, else false

      public void show()
      Uses private methods to menage the phase, the call the executor and notify the result of the operation with a printed message
